text: Nyang pajoh riba teuma jih salah Peue-peue nyang tacok got tajok riba Mangat areuta teuh le meutamah Hana meutamah dumnyan bak Tuhan f Teuma laen ban nyang Neupeurintah Meu tabri zakeut ikheulah ate Atrateuh sabe meutamah-tamah y Nyan keuh ureueng nyang tamah areuta Meuganda-ganda teuma phaedah
